name: ProMedica Home Health - Ann Arbor
PageTitle: ProMedica Home Health Serving Ann Arbor
Services:
Admission follow-up call within 24-48 hours after admission
On-site referral coordination
Hospice Transition
Heartland Clinicians sent to the Emergency Department to meet patients who have gone to the hospital
Strong customer service focus
Positive clinical outcomes: re-hospitalizations
Positive clinical outcomes: emergent care
Positive clinical outcomes: Activities of Daily Living (ADLs)
Positive patient satisfaction results
Tuck-in phone calls before weekend or holidays
Heart Disease Management
Pulmonary Disease Management
Alzheimer's Disease Management
Joint Disease Management
Orthopedics/Total Joint Replacement Management
Parkinson's Disease Management
Stroke Management
Diabetes Management
Specialty nurses for wound care
Specialty nurses for oncology care
Wound V.A.C.
Long tenure of leadership in agency
